metadata.title: USN-5060-2 -- NTFS-3G vulnerabilities
metadata.description: USN-5060-1 fixed a vulnerability in NTFS-3G. This update provides the corresponding update for Ubuntu 14.04 ESM and Ubuntu 16.04 ESM.  Original advisory details:   It was discovered that NTFS-3G incorrectly handled certain image file.  An attacker could possibly use this issue to execute arbitrary code.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-5060-2` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  ntfs-3g - 1:2015.3.14AR.1-1ubuntu0.3+esm1 ntfs-3g-dev - 1:2015.3.14AR.1-1ubuntu0.3+esm1 Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro
